content.text: can you tell me what the stiffness metric should be for a groove and the exhibition

To determine the stiffness matrix for a groove and during an exhibition scenario, I would need more context—specifically, the orientation of the groove in relation to the robot's camera frame or any user input indicating the task's dynamics. If you could provide an image or more details regarding the orientation or any geometric constraints, I could help calculate the appropriate stiffness matrix.
